SELECT ma.*, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct mc.category_name ) AS categorysName, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct mc.category_url ) AS categorysUrl, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct mt.tag_name ) AS tagsName, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct mt.tag_url ) AS tagsUrl FROM liawan_article ma LEFT JOIN liawan_article_category mac ON ma.id = mac.article_id LEFT JOIN liawan_category mc ON mc.category_id = mac.category_id LEFT JOIN liawan_article_tag mat ON ma.id = mat.article_id LEFT JOIN liawan_tag mt ON mt.tag_id = mat.tag_id
GROUP BY ma.id ORDER BY article_updatetime DESC,article_newstime DESC

SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.article_content, a.article_content_md, a.article_newstime, a.article_summary, a.article_thumbnail, a.article_title, article_type, a.article_comment, a.article_url, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct b.category_id) categorys, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct c.tag_id) tags FROM liawan_article a INNER JOIN liawan_article_category b on b.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN liawan_article_tag c on a.id = b.article_id AND b.article_id = c.article_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
select DATE_FORMAT(article_newstime, '%Y年%m月') as date, count(*) as count from liawan_article where article_post = 'post' and article_status = 0 group by date order by date desc

SELECT ma.*, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct mc.category_name) AS categorysName, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct mc.category_url) AS categorysUrl, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct mt.tag_name) AS tagsName, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct mt.tag_url) AS tagsUrl FROM liawan_article ma LEFT JOIN liawan_article_category mac ON ma.id = mac.article_id LEFT JOIN liawan_category mc ON mc.category_id = mac.category_id LEFT JOIN liawan_article_tag mat ON ma.id = mat.article_id LEFT JOIN liawan_tag mt ON mt.tag_id = mat.tag_id WHERE article_url = #{articleUrl} GROUP BY ma.id

SELECT * FROM liawan_article WHERE id in (SELECT article_id FROM liawan_article_category WHERE category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM liawan_category WHERE category_url = #{category.categoryUrl})) and article_status = #{status}
SELECT * FROM liawan_article WHERE id in (SELECT article_id FROM liawan_article_tag WHERE tag_id = (SELECT tag_id FROM liawan_tag WHERE tag_url = #{tag.tagUrl})) and article_status = #{status}
